_setup_instructions: 1. Go to Google Cloud Console: https://console.cloud.google.com/
2. Create a new project or select existing
4. Go to Credentials > Create Credentials > OAuth 2.0 Client IDs
6. Download the JSON file and save as config/youtube_credentials.json
7. Set 'enabled' to true in this file
8. Run the uploader - it will open a browser for OAuth authorization

tiktok.note: TikTok upload requires manual setup - API access is limited
_setup_instructions: TikTok's Content Posting API has limited availability.
